verses.verse: And it came <S%G1096><s%> to pass, that, as the people <S%G3793><s%> pressed <S%G1945><s%> on him to hear <S%G191><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> he stood <S%G2476><s%> by the lake <S%G3041><s%> of Gennesaret, <S%G1082><s%>

And saw <S%G1492><s%> two <S%G1417><s%> ships <S%G4143><s%> standing <S%G2476><s%> by the lake: <S%G3041><s%> but the fishermen <S%G231><s%> were gone <S%G576><s%> out of them, and were washing <S%G637><s%> their nets. <S%G1350><s%>

And he entered <S%G1684><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> of the ships, <S%G4143><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> was Simon's, <S%G4613><s%> and prayed <S%G2065><s%> him that he would thrust <S%G1877><s%> out a little <S%G3641><s%> from the land. <S%G1095><s%> And he sat <S%G2523><s%> down, <S%G2523><s%> and taught <S%G1321><s%> the people <S%G3793><s%> out of the ship. <S%G4143><s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> when <S%G5613><s%> he had left <S%G3973><s%> speaking, <S%G2980><s%> he said <S%G2036><s%> to Simon, <S%G4613><s%> Launch <S%G1877><s%> out into <S%G1519><s%> the deep, <S%G899><s%> and let <S%G5465><s%> down <S%G5465><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> nets <S%G1350><s%> for a draught. <S%G61><s%>

And Simon <S%G4613><s%> answering <S%G611><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> to him, Master, <S%G1988><s%> we have toiled <S%G2872><s%> all <S%G3650><s%> the night, <S%G3571><s%> and have taken <S%G2983><s%> nothing: <S%G3762><s%> nevertheless <S%G1161><s%> at <S%G1909><s%> your word <S%G4487><s%> I will let <S%G5465><s%> down <S%G5465><s%> the net. <S%G1350><s%>

And when they had this <S%G5124><s%> done, <S%G4160><s%> they enclosed <S%G4788><s%> a great <S%G4183><s%> multitude <S%G4128><s%> of fishes: <S%G2486><s%> and their net <S%G1350><s%> broke. <S%G1284><s%>

And they beckoned <S%G2656><s%> to their partners, <S%G3353><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> were in the other <S%G2087><s%> ship, <S%G4143><s%> that they should come <S%G2064><s%> and help <S%G4815><s%> them. And they came, <S%G2064><s%> and filled <S%G4130><s%> both <S%G297><s%> the ships, <S%G4143><s%> so <S%G5620><s%> that they began to sink. <S%G1036><s%>

When Simon <S%G4613><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> saw <S%G1492><s%> it, he fell <S%G4363><s%> down at <S%G4363><s%> Jesus' <S%G2424><s%> knees, <S%G1119><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> Depart <S%G1831><s%> from me; for I am <S%G1510><s%> a sinful <S%G268><s%> man, <S%G435><s%> O Lord. <S%G2962><s%>

For he was astonished, <S%G4023><s%> <S%G2285><s%> and all <S%G3956><s%> that were with him, at <S%G1909><s%> the draught <S%G61><s%> of the fishes <S%G2486><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> they had taken: <S%G4815><s%>

And so <S%G3668><s%> was also <S%G2532><s%> James, <S%G2385><s%> and John, <S%G2491><s%> the sons <S%G5207><s%> of Zebedee, <S%G2199><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> were partners <S%G2844><s%> with Simon. <S%G4613><s%> And Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> to Simon, <S%G4613><s%> Fear <S%G5399><s%> not; from now on <S%G3568><s%> you shall catch <S%G2221><s%> men. <S%G444><s%>
And when they had brought <S%G2609><s%> their ships <S%G4143><s%> to land, <S%G1095><s%> they forsook <S%G863><s%> all, <S%G537><s%> and followed <S%G190><s%> him.

And it came <S%G1096><s%> to pass, when <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> he was in a certain <S%G1520><s%> city, <S%G4172><s%> behold <S%G2400><s%> a man <S%G435><s%> full <S%G4134><s%> of leprosy: <S%G3014><s%> who seeing <S%G1492><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> fell <S%G4098><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> his face, <S%G4383><s%> and sought <S%G1189><s%> him, saying, <S%G3004><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> you will, <S%G2309><s%> you can <S%G1410><s%> make <S%G2511><s%> me clean. <S%G2511><s%>

And he put <S%G1614><s%> forth <S%G1614><s%> his hand, <S%G5495><s%> and touched <S%G680><s%> him, saying, <S%G2036><s%> I will: <S%G2309><s%> be you clean. <S%G2511><s%> And immediately <S%G2112><s%> the leprosy <S%G3014><s%> departed <S%G565><s%> from him.

And he charged <S%G3853><s%> him to tell <S%G2036><s%> no <S%G3367><s%> man: <S%G3367><s%> but go, <S%G565><s%> and show <S%G1166><s%> yourself <S%G4572><s%> to the priest, <S%G2409><s%> and offer <S%G4374><s%> for your cleansing, <S%G2512><s%> according as Moses <S%G3475><s%> commanded, <S%G4367><s%> for a testimony <S%G3142><s%> to them.

But so much <S%G3123><s%> the more <S%G3123><s%> went <S%G1330><s%> there a fame <S%G3056><s%> abroad <S%G1330><s%> of him: and great <S%G4183><s%> multitudes <S%G3793><s%> came <S%G4905><s%> together <S%G4905><s%> to hear, <S%G191><s%> and to be healed <S%G2323><s%> by him of their infirmities. <S%G769><s%>
And he withdrew <S%G5298><s%> himself into <S%G1722><s%> the wilderness, <S%G2048><s%> and prayed. <S%G4336><s%>

And it came <S%G1096><s%> to pass on <S%G1722><s%> a certain <S%G1520><s%> day, <S%G2250><s%> as he was teaching, <S%G1321><s%> that there were Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> and doctors <S%G3547><s%> of the law <S%G3547><s%> sitting <S%G2521><s%> by, which <S%G3739><s%> were come <S%G2064><s%> out of every <S%G3956><s%> town <S%G2968><s%> of Galilee, <S%G1056><s%> and Judaea, <S%G2449><s%> and Jerusalem: <S%G2419><s%> and the power <S%G1411><s%> of the Lord <S%G2962><s%> was present to heal <S%G2390><s%> them.

And, behold, <S%G2400><s%> men <S%G435><s%> brought <S%G5342><s%> in a bed <S%G2825><s%> a man <S%G444><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> was taken with a palsy: <S%G3886><s%> and they sought <S%G2212><s%> means to bring <S%G1533><s%> him in, and to lay <S%G5087><s%> him before <S%G1799><s%> him.

And when they could not find <S%G2147><s%> by what <S%G4169><s%> way they might bring <S%G1533><s%> him in because <S%G1223><s%> of the multitude, <S%G3793><s%> they went <S%G305><s%> on the housetop, <S%G1430><s%> and let <S%G2524><s%> him down <S%G2524><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> the tiling <S%G2766><s%> with his couch <S%G2826><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the middle <S%G3319><s%> before <S%G1715><s%> Jesus. <S%G2424><s%>
And when he saw <S%G1492><s%> their faith, <S%G4102><s%> he said <S%G2036><s%> to him, Man, <S%G444><s%> your sins <S%G266><s%> are forgiven <S%G863><s%> you.

And the scribes <S%G1122><s%> and the Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> began <S%G756><s%> to reason, <S%G1260><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> Who <S%G5101><s%> is this <S%G3778><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> speaks <S%G2980><s%> blasphemies? <S%G988><s%> Who <S%G5101><s%> can <S%G1410><s%> forgive <S%G863><s%> sins, <S%G266><s%> but God <S%G2316><s%> alone? <S%G3441><s%>

But when Jesus <S%G2424><s%> perceived <S%G1921><s%> their thoughts, <S%G1261><s%> he answering <S%G611><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> to them, What <S%G5101><s%> reason <S%G1260><s%> you in your <S%G5216><s%> hearts? <S%G2588><s%>

Whether <S%G5101><s%> is easier, <S%G2123><s%> to say, <S%G2036><s%> Your sins <S%G266><s%> be forgiven <S%G863><s%> you; or <S%G2228><s%> to say, <S%G2036><s%> Rise <S%G1453><s%> up and walk? <S%G4043><s%>

But that you may know <S%G1492><s%> that the Son <S%G5207><s%> of man <S%G444><s%> has <S%G2192><s%> power <S%G1849><s%> on earth <S%G1093><s%> to forgive <S%G863><s%> sins, <S%G266><s%> (he said <S%G2036><s%> to the sick <S%G3885><s%> of the palsy, <S%G3886><s%>) I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, Arise, <S%G1453><s%> and take <S%G142><s%> up your couch, <S%G2826><s%> and go <S%G4198><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> your <S%G4675><s%> house. <S%G3624><s%>

And immediately <S%G3916><s%> he rose <S%G450><s%> up before <S%G1799><s%> them, and took <S%G142><s%> up that where on <S%G1909><s%> <S%G3739><s%> he lay, <S%G2621><s%> and departed <S%G565><s%> to his own house, <S%G3624><s%> glorifying <S%G1392><s%> God. <S%G2316><s%>

And they were all <S%G537><s%> amazed, <S%G1611><s%> <S%G2983><s%> and they glorified <S%G1392><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> and were filled <S%G4130><s%> with fear, <S%G5401><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> We have seen <S%G1492><s%> strange <S%G3861><s%> things to day. <S%G4594><s%>

And after <S%G3326><s%> these <S%G5023><s%> things he went <S%G1831><s%> forth, <S%G1831><s%> and saw <S%G2300><s%> a publican, <S%G5057><s%> named <S%G3686><s%> Levi, <S%G3018><s%> sitting <S%G2521><s%> at <S%G1909><s%> the receipt <S%G5058><s%> of custom: <S%G5058><s%> and he said <S%G2036><s%> to him, Follow <S%G190><s%> me.
And he left <S%G2641><s%> all, <S%G537><s%> rose <S%G450><s%> up, and followed <S%G190><s%> him.

And Levi <S%G3018><s%> made <S%G4160><s%> him a great <S%G3173><s%> feast <S%G1403><s%> in his own house: <S%G3614><s%> and there was a great <S%G4183><s%> company <S%G3793><s%> of publicans <S%G5057><s%> and of others <S%G243><s%> that sat <S%G2621><s%> down <S%G2621><s%> with them.

But their scribes <S%G1122><s%> and Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> murmured <S%G1111><s%> against <S%G4314><s%> his disciples, <S%G3101><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> Why <S%G1302><s%> do you eat <S%G2068><s%> and drink <S%G4095><s%> with publicans <S%G5057><s%> and sinners? <S%G268><s%>

And Jesus <S%G2424><s%> answering <S%G611><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> to them, They that are whole <S%G5198><s%> need <S%G2192><s%> <S%G5532><s%> not a physician; <S%G2395><s%> but they that are sick. <S%G2192><s%> <S%G2560><s%>
I came <S%G2064><s%> not to call <S%G2564><s%> the righteous, <S%G1342><s%> but sinners <S%G268><s%> to repentance. <S%G3341><s%>

And they said <S%G2036><s%> to him, Why <S%G1302><s%> do the disciples <S%G3101><s%> of John <S%G2491><s%> fast <S%G3522><s%> often, <S%G4437><s%> and make <S%G4160><s%> prayers, <S%G1162><s%> and likewise <S%G3668><s%> the disciples of the Pharisees; <S%G5330><s%> but your <S%G4674><s%> eat <S%G2068><s%> and drink? <S%G4095><s%>

And he said <S%G2036><s%> to them, Can <S%G1410><s%> you make <S%G4160><s%> the children <S%G5207><s%> of the bridal chamber <S%G3567><s%> fast, <S%G3522><s%> while <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3739><s%> the bridegroom <S%G3566><s%> is with them?

But the days <S%G2250><s%> will come, <S%G2064><s%> when <S%G3752><s%> the bridegroom <S%G3566><s%> shall be taken <S%G522><s%> away <S%G851><s%> from them, and then <S%G5119><s%> shall they fast <S%G3522><s%> in those <S%G1565><s%> days. <S%G2250><s%>

And he spoke <S%G3004><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> a parable <S%G3850><s%> to them; No <S%G3762><s%> man <S%G3762><s%> puts <S%G1911><s%> a piece <S%G1915><s%> of a new <S%G2537><s%> garment <S%G2440><s%> on an old; <S%G3820><s%> if <S%G1490><s%> otherwise, <S%G1490><s%> then both <S%G2532><s%> the new <S%G2537><s%> makes <S%G4977><s%> a rent, <S%G4977><s%> and the piece <S%G1915><s%> that was taken out of the new <S%G2537><s%> agrees <S%G4856><s%> not with the old. <S%G3820><s%>

And no <S%G3762><s%> man <S%G3762><s%> puts <S%G906><s%> new <S%G3501><s%> wine <S%G3631><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> old <S%G3820><s%> bottles; <S%G779><s%> else <S%G1490><s%> the new <S%G3501><s%> wine <S%G3631><s%> will burst <S%G4486><s%> the bottles, <S%G779><s%> and be spilled, <S%G1632><s%> and the bottles <S%G779><s%> shall perish. <S%G622><s%>
But new <S%G3501><s%> wine <S%G3631><s%> must be put <S%G906><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> new <S%G2537><s%> bottles; <S%G779><s%> and both <S%G297><s%> are preserved. <S%G4933><s%>

No <S%G3762><s%> man <S%G3762><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> having drunk <S%G4095><s%> old <S%G3820><s%> wine straightway <S%G2112><s%> desires <S%G2309><s%> new: <S%G2537><s%> for he said, <S%G3004><s%> The old <S%G3820><s%> is better. <S%G5543><s%>
